column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My favorite place to chow down in the city? Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba
column2: of course!! Lincoln Park if full of amazing restaurants and mouth watering food
column3: but Ba-Ba-Reeba is by far my favorite. I'll admit
column4: I'm a tapas snob. I can't help but comparing every dish and every pitcher of sangria to what I ate/drank in Spain. Admittedly
column5: tapas bars in America are all white-washed and made to appeal to the masses. Sure
column6: you're not likely to see too many sardines on the menu (I'm assuming not many would order them anyway) but what they do make
column7: they make very well. So well
column9: that I have walked 20 minutes through snow to get there - I'm from California
column10: so you know this is a big deal to me!
